tool_description:
An api for sending text messages and verifying users using their phone numbers
www.textflow.me
name: TextFlow SMS API
title: TextFlow SMS API

api_list.name: Check service availability
api_list.description: Check the service response time and availability.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://textflow-sms-api.p.rapidapi.com/service/check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "textflow-sms-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Send SMS
api_list.description: Send a text message by targeting this POST endpoint. Provide phone_number and text in the body and we will send you a response. Make sure that phone_number has a country code.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://textflow-sms-api.p.rapidapi.com/send-sms"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "textflow-sms-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Send OTP verification code
api_list.description: Send a 6 digit verification code to a number to verify that it belongs to your user.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://textflow-sms-api.p.rapidapi.com/send-code"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "textflow-sms-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Check OTP verification code
api_list.description: One your user inputs the code that they received, send that code and users phone_number to this endpoint to complete verification.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://textflow-sms-api.p.rapidapi.com/verify-code"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "textflow-sms-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
